titleStmt.title: Persecutio undecima, or, The churches eleventh persecution being a brief of the fanatick persecution of the Protestant clergy of the Church of England, more particularly within the city of London : begun in Parliament, Anno Dom. 1641, and printed in the year 1648.
titleStmt.author: Chestlin.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed in the year 1681, and are to be sold by Walter Davis ...,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

"A general bill of the mortality of the clergy of London ... ministers ... who have been imprisoned, plundered ... and deprived of all livelihood ... for their constancy in the Protestant religion ... and their loyalty to their soveraign": p. 23-26.
